most_active_tickets.title: Neural Code Search returns no results
Unable to Launch Pieces Windows Desktop Version

common_issues.title: Pieces OS Functionality and Launch Issues
common_issues.description: Users report Pieces OS search not returning results and application launch failures on Windows.  Suggested solutions include waiting for search upgrades, checking for updates, and providing log files for troubleshooting. Issues persist as of November 2024.

related_issues.title: Neural Code Search returns no results
related_issues.text:
Neural Code Search returns no results
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.0.3

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I have four materials entered since a few days ago and NCS type search never returns anything.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/cea82b95-b382-45f3-8777-227d3abd2269)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/175e6117-9ef6-49c0-94f2-26812b788080)
## GitHub Issue Conversation Summary

**Key Points Raised:**

* User (@hovek) reported an issue with the Pieces search functionality.
* Support bot (@pieces-support-bot) acknowledged the issue and provided resources.
* Support representative (@mark-at-pieces) explained the different search methods: NCS, FTS, and Blended.

**Problems Identified:**

* User found the search functionality confusing.
* Existing search methods were not meeting user needs.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* A major search upgrade is planned for the end of the quarter.
* Representative explained existing search methods and their uses.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* User's issue has been acknowledged and addressed.
* Improved search functionality is expected in the future.

**Additional Notes:**

* The provided conversation does not indicate whether the implemented solution resolved the user's initial issue.

related_issues.title: Unable to Launch Pieces Windows Desktop Version
related_issues.text:
Unable to Launch Pieces Windows Desktop Version
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

version: 8.0

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

**Issue:**
I am encountering difficulties with installing and launching the Pieces Windows desktop version. After a successful installation, the software fails to open properly. Despite confirming its presence in the task manager, there is no visible output on the screen.

**Steps to Reproduce:**

- Download and install the Pieces Windows desktop version.
- Attempt to launch the software.
- Observe that the program does not open on the screen.
- Check the task manager to confirm the software is running in the background.

**Expected Behavior:**
Upon installation, the Pieces Windows desktop version should launch and display its interface on the screen, allowing users to interact with it

**Actual Behavior:**
After installation, the software does not open as expected. Despite running in the background according to the task manager, there is no visible output on the screen.

**System Information:**

- Windows version: 22H2 (OS Build 19045)

**Additional Notes:**
I have attempted to troubleshoot this issue without success. Any assistance or insights into resolving this matter would be greatly appreciated. Thank you for your attention to this matter.
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation: Pieces OS Launch Issues

**Key Points:**

* Users are experiencing issues launching Pieces OS on Windows and macOS.
* The issue seems to be related to the App Installer technology and/or the Pieces for Developers extension.
* The problem prevents users from connecting to Pieces OS and using its features within the browser extension.

**Problems Identified:**

* Pieces OS fails to launch when initiated from the Pieces suite or the start menu on Windows.
* Clicking buttons within the Pieces for Developers extension results in a "Failed to connect to Pieces OS" error message.
* The issue persists even after updating Pieces OS and the extension.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* Sharing log files from the specified location.
* Checking for updates in the Microsoft Store.
* Referring to similar issues reported previously.
* Updating to the latest version of Pieces OS and the extension.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The issue remains unresolved for some users as of November 8, 2024.
* Users are still experiencing the launch failure and connection error.
* No definitive solution has been identified or implemented.

recommendations: **Prioritize resolution of Pieces OS launch issues on Windows:** This appears to be a recurring and widespread problem impacting user experience.
**Investigate and address the root cause of Neural Code Search failures:**  No results returned from search severely hinders user workflows and necessitates a prompt fix.
**Improve search functionality documentation and user guidance:** Provide clearer explanations of different search methods (NCS, FTS, Blended) and their limitations to manage user expectations.

**Gather more detailed logs and system information:**  Request detailed logs and system information from users experiencing launch issues to aid in troubleshooting and identifying potential solutions.

**Consider creating a dedicated troubleshooting guide for Windows users:**  A comprehensive guide addressing common Windows-specific issues can alleviate support volume and empower users to self-resolve problems.
